action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A bathroom with a toilet, a sink, a window with blinds, a towel rack, and a door. The walls are beige and the floor is tiled. The toilet is white and the sink is white with a beige countertop. The window is in the back wall and the door is on the right side of the image. The towel rack is above the toilet. There is a roll of toilet paper on the wall next to the toilet. The blinds are closed. The door is open and there is a white handle on the door. The floor is tiled in a light beige color. There is a shadow from the window on the floor.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A bathroom with a white toilet and a white pedestal sink. The floor is wood laminate. There is a mirror on the wall above the sink. The mirror is reflecting a view of a kitchen with a stainless steel oven. The bathroom is small and has a door on the left side of the image.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A bathroom with a toilet, a sink, a window with blinds, a towel rack, and a door. The walls are beige and the floor is tiled. The toilet is white and the sink is white with a beige countertop. The window is in the back wall and the door is on the right side of the image. The towel rack is above the toilet. There is a roll of toilet paper on the wall next to the toilet. The blinds are closed. The door is open and there is a white handle on the door. The floor is tiled in a light beige color. There is a shadow from the window on the floor.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Does your image have a mirror?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A bathroom with a white toilet and a white pedestal sink. The floor is wood laminate. There is a mirror on the wall above the sink. The mirror is reflecting a view of a kitchen with a stainless steel oven. The bathroom is small and has a door on the left side of the image.
QUESTION: Does your image have a mirror? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there a window in your image?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Is there a window in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: No
